about_the_game: Don't have an outfit this Halloween? No sweat, we've got you covered... literally. Sure, you won't be able to see anything, but what fun would it be if you could? We present to you: Zombie Playground in-game, aesthetic Halloween themed Buckethead and Roadblock hats.
detailed_description: Don't have an outfit this Halloween? No sweat, we've got you covered... literally. Sure, you won't be able to see anything, but what fun would it be if you could? We present to you: Zombie Playground in-game, aesthetic Halloween themed Buckethead and Roadblock hats.

name: ZPG - Halloween Headwear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7950 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Zombie Playground in-game, aesthetic Halloween themed Buckethead and Roadblock hats.
